author: felix314159_
content: i did some eth_config response comparisons for the holesky config, basically just initializing the provided genesis and then comparing json rpc responses. i think we need to align on this, from a testing perspective i would like it if we reached a point where all responses are exactly the same. yes it is a bit of an odd case (latest block is block 0), feel free to give ur take what response is most aligned to the specs. to me geth or nethermind makes the most sense tbh, but the eip mentions besu as reference implementation (but their response makes no sense to me). lmk what u think if u find the time, its not urgent

author: felix314159_
content: reth is missing cuz they are currently reworking eth_config related code
